About Me

I'm a motivated second year student currently studying Cellular, Physiological & Anatomical Sciences and Computer Science, with experience building and scaling web applications in various domains. I'm also passionate about open-source contributions, working in high impact environments, and helping growing development teams build great products.

Experience

Undergraduate Teaching Assistant

University of British Columbia: Sep 2020 - Present

Department of Computer Science, CPSC 110.

  • Led labs, problem set grading, and relayed student needs to professor
  • Navigated the challenges of teaching programming virtually to groups of 10-12 students at a time
  • Developed skills in effectively describing the thought process behind code without explicitly giving the answer
DrRacket Racket Systematic Programming Systematic Program Design

Research Assistant

University of British Columbia: May 2020 - Sep 2020

  • Working closely with professor Stefan Reinsberg and PhD student Firas Moosvi (SAR Lab: focus in Medical Physics)
  • Developed a collection of code using the Leaflet API to layer and tile histology images
  • Created an arduino program to control the PT410 Cryorefrigeratror used to monitor and keep the 7T Bruker Magnet running
Python HTML CSS JavaScript Arduino C Raspberry Pi Docopt CLI Jinja2 Flask

Volunteer Scratch and Web Development Instructor

The C.O.D.E. Initiative - July 2020 - Present

The C.O.D.E. Initiative is an organization that specializes in offering educational opportunities in computer science for children with learning differences.

  • Teaching Scratch and web development (HTML/CSS/JavaScript) to neurotypical and neurodiverse (on the autism spectrum) kids ages 8-20.
Scratch HTML CSS JavaScript
